text:
Guido Cerniglia (3 February 1939 – 14 May 2020) was an Italian actor and theatre director. He was born in Palermo, Italy. He was known for his roles in "The Scientific Cardplayer" (1972), "Alla mia cara mamma nel giorno del suo compleanno" (1974) and in "Il giustiziere di mezzogiorno" (1975).
Cerniglia died in Rome on 14 May 2020, aged 81.

annotations.surface_form: Alla mia cara mamma nel giorno del suo compleanno
